title: Show HN: I built a Python library for central bank economic announcement data
description: Python client library to give traders, quants, and analysts access to forex macroeconomic data via the FXMacroData API. - fxmacrodata/fxmacrodata
content:
The FXMacroData Python SDK provides a simple and efficient interface for fetching macroeconomic indicators and forex price history from FXMacroData.
It includes both synchronous and asynchronous cli… [+3249 chars]
